member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.ServiceDiscovery.Dns.DnsServiceEndpointProviderBase
member.summary: A service end point provider that uses DNS to resolve the service end points.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.ServiceDiscovery.Dns.DnsServiceEndpointProviderBase.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.ServiceDiscovery.ServiceEndpointQuery,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger,System.TimeProvider)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.ServiceDiscovery.Dns.DnsServiceEndpointProviderOptions
member.summary: Options for configuring .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.ServiceDiscovery.Dns.DnsServiceEndpointProviderOptions.DefaultRefreshPeriod
member.summary: Gets or sets the default refresh period for endpoints resolved from DNS.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.ServiceDiscovery.Dns.DnsServiceEndpointProviderOptions.MinRetryPeriod
member.summary: Gets or sets the initial period between retries.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.ServiceDiscovery.Dns.DnsServiceEndpointProviderOptions.MaxRetryPeriod
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum period between retries.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.ServiceDiscovery.Dns.DnsServiceEndpointProviderOptions.RetryBackOffFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets the retry period growth factor.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.ServiceDiscovery.Dns.DnsServiceEndpointProviderOptions.ShouldApplyHostNameMetadata
member.summary: Gets or sets a delegate used to determine whether to apply host name metadata to each resolved endpoint. Defaults to false.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.ServiceDiscovery.Dns.DnsSrvServiceEndpointProviderOptions
member.summary: Options for configuring .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.ServiceDiscovery.Dns.DnsSrvServiceEndpointProviderOptions.DefaultRefreshPeriod
member.summary: Gets or sets the default refresh period for endpoints resolved from DNS.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.ServiceDiscovery.Dns.DnsSrvServiceEndpointProviderOptions.MinRetryPeriod
member.summary: Gets or sets the initial period between retries.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.ServiceDiscovery.Dns.DnsSrvServiceEndpointProviderOptions.MaxRetryPeriod
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum period between retries.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.ServiceDiscovery.Dns.DnsSrvServiceEndpointProviderOptions.RetryBackOffFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets the retry period growth factor.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.ServiceDiscovery.Dns.DnsSrvServiceEndpointProviderOptions.QuerySuffix
member.summary: Gets or sets the default DNS query suffix for services resolved via this provider.
member.remarks: If not specified, the provider will attempt to infer the namespace.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.ServiceDiscovery.Dns.DnsSrvServiceEndpointProviderOptions.ShouldApplyHostNameMetadata
member.summary: Gets or sets a delegate used to determine whether to apply host name metadata to each resolved endpoint. Defaults to false.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.ServiceDiscoveryDnsServiceCollectionExtensions
member.summary: Extensions for to add service discovery.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.ServiceDiscoveryDnsServiceCollectionExtensions.AddDnsSrvServiceEndpointProvider(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Adds DNS SRV service discovery to the .
member.remarks: DNS SRV queries are able to provide port numbers for endpoints and can support multiple named endpoints per service. However, not all environment support DNS SRV queries, and in some environments, additional configuration may be required.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.ServiceDiscoveryDnsServiceCollectionExtensions.AddDnsSrvServiceEndpointProvider(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.Action{Microsoft.Extensions.ServiceDiscovery.Dns.DnsSrvServiceEndpointProviderOptions})
member.summary: Adds DNS SRV service discovery to the .
member.param: The DNS SRV service discovery configuration options.
member.remarks: DNS SRV queries are able to provide port numbers for endpoints and can support multiple named endpoints per service. However, not all environment support DNS SRV queries, and in some environments, additional configuration may be required.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.ServiceDiscoveryDnsServiceCollectionExtensions.AddDnsServiceEndpointProvider(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Adds DNS service discovery to the .
member.remarks: DNS A/AAAA queries are widely available but are not able to provide port numbers for endpoints and cannot support multiple named endpoints per service.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.ServiceDiscoveryDnsServiceCollectionExtensions.AddDnsServiceEndpointProvider(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.Action{Microsoft.Extensions.ServiceDiscovery.Dns.DnsServiceEndpointProviderOptions})
member.summary: Adds DNS service discovery to the .
member.param: The DNS SRV service discovery configuration options.
member.remarks: DNS A/AAAA queries are widely available but are not able to provide port numbers for endpoints and cannot support multiple named endpoints per service.
